issue.title: [Doc] Add HDFS and Windows documents to doxygen output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-957](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-957). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently these documents are not rendered on the website. I would move them to the `apidoc/` folder and link to them in the main doxygen page. Probably this is the point where we also would move `apidoc/` back to `docs/`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-957?focusedCommentId=15999605) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Sounds good to me.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-957?focusedCommentId=16001950) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 659
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/659>
